Counterfactual.description:
• Does not meet net zero by 2050
  • Slowest decarbonisation effort
  • Heavy reliance on gas across all sectors

Electric Engagement.description:
• Net zero compliant to 2050 target
  • Electricity is the main energy source for heating

Holistic Transition.description:
• Net zero compliant to 2050 target
  • Heating primarily through electricity
  • Hydrogen used around industrial clusters
  • Smart homes and electric vehicles provide grid flexibility

Hydrogen Evolution.description:
• Net zero compliant to 2050 target
  • Energy system adapted for hydrogen use
  • Hydrogen used in heating and industry
